craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 Attack Damage for the rest of combat.
This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1600 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 60%.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 400 damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: The holder's attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Physical damage heals the holder for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 30% max health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 40% bonus Attack Speed.

The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Grants 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain bonus Ability Power equal to 40% of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400★ damage for 8 seconds.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder deals magic damage or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target, abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
The holder gains both of the following:
- +10 Attack Damage and +10 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 10% of damage dealt.

At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased to 35(%).

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 20% of their maximum health as true damage over 8 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 30% of their max Health (1 second cooldown).

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 15 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex(es) in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three item Slots]

embl.name: SwordoftheDivine
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: LegionnaireEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion].
Elusive - cannot be crafted.]

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:

embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Draconic trait.

embl.name: InvokerEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Invoker trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion].

embl.name: BrawlerEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Brawler trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion.

embl.name: SentinelEmblem
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Sentinel trait.

embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Mystic trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion].
Elusive - cannot be crafted.]

radi.add_attrs: Contributing to a kill grants the holder 15 Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

radi.name: RadiantGiantSlayer
radi.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 40% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1400 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%.

The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 40% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Ability Power

spec.name: ForceofNature
spec.attrs: The holder's team gains +1 maximum team size.
